Text:
Thank you ez! This show is the best ever. I’ve already seen this episode, buts its worth at least 10 viewings. So good! I almost cried when that white walker killed Samwell, and he was just trying to protect Jon! I didn’t expect him to die so soon! And then Jaime escaped from his cage and almost beheaded Robb! Best scene in the show and what an awesome fight. And I cant believe Daenerys rode her dragon into the city when they refused to let her people in! That wasn’t in the book but so badass! I cant wait for when she marries Joffrey so she can have the iron throne! Best episode in the season easily!

@powers987 While nothing he said happened in the books, I would like to point out that there is a lot of shit that happens/doesn't happen in True Blood compared to the books that show is based on. So already we know that HBO likes to change story elements based on books. That gives a little bit of credibility up to where he says Dany rides in on a Dragon. 

Mark my words HBO is gonna change the series and to those that are fans of the books. And some of the fans are not gonna like it. Or they will leave out some character that is cool and somewhat crucial to the story. Like killing samwell is something HBO would actually do.

My proof? Okay Claudine was known in Bon Temps by everyone. Elvis is a vampire, and was  introduced before the witches. Lafayette doesn't exist in the books.
